content.query:
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where not (instanceId in ("40290", "40800", "150", "450", "151", "451"))
| where "{host_token}" == "All" or original_host in ({host_token})
| where Allowance
| summarize count() by JobResultMessage = JobResultMessage

Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where instanceId in (150, 151)
| where "{host_token}" == "All" or original_host in ({host_token})
| where Allowance == true
| extend TransferredGb = todouble(
      extract(@"TransferredGb=""([^""]*)""", 1, SyslogMessage)
  )
| summarize TotalTransferredGb = sum(TransferredGb)
| extend Name = "Transferred Data (Gb)"
| project Name, TotalTransferredGb

Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where instanceId==151 or instanceId==150
| where Allowance
| extend TransferredGb = todouble(extract("TransferredGb=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage))

Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where not (instanceId in ("40290", "40800", "150", "450", "151", "451"))
| where JobResultMessage == "{ResultMessage}"
| where "{host_token}" == "All" or original_host in ({host_token})
| where Allowance
content.title: Events with `{ResultMessage}` status:

content.query:
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where instanceId in ("190","790","194","490","36022","36026")
| where Allowance
| where "{host_token}" == "All" or original_host in ({host_token})
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), JobResultMessage
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| render timechart
content.title: Backup and Backup Copy Jobs

content.query:
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where instanceId == "390"
| where Allowance
| where "{host_token}" == "All" or original_host in ({host_token})
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), JobResultMessage
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| render timechart
content.title: SureBackup Jobs

content.query:
let dateWithoutWeekday = substring("{BackupAndBackupCopyJobsTime}", 4, 29);
let dateDatetime = todatetime(dateWithoutWeekday);
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where instanceId in ("190","790","194","490","36022","36026")
| where Allowance
| where JobResultMessage == "{BackupAndBackupCopyJobsStatus}"
| where TimeGenerated >= startofday(dateDatetime) 
| where TimeGenerated < startofday(dateDatetime) + 1d
content.title: Backup and Backup Copy Jobs Drilldown

| project TimeGenerated, ["Data Source"] = Computer, User = user, State = Result, SyslogMessage, StringTime = tostring(TimeGenerated), Description

content.query:
let dateWithoutWeekday = substring("{FinishedJobsByTypeTime}", 4, 29);
let dateDatetime = todatetime(dateWithoutWeekday);
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where instanceId in ("190","40290","790","194","490","390","36022","36026")
| where Allowance
| where JobTypeDescription == "{FinishedJobsByTypeStatus}"
| where TimeGenerated >= startofday(dateDatetime) 
| where TimeGenerated < startofday(dateDatetime) + 1d
| project TimeGenerated, ["Data Source"] = original_host, ["Message Details"] = Description, ["Job Type"] = JobTypeDescription, State = JobResultMessage, SyslogMessage
content.title: Finished Jobs by Type Drilldown

content.query:
let dateWithoutWeekday = substring("{FinishedRestoreSessionsByTypeTime}", 4, 29);

Veeam_GetJobFinished
| where instanceId in ("40290", "40800")
| where JobTypeDescription == "{FinishedRestoreSessionsByTypeStatus}"
| where TimeGenerated >= startofday(dateDatetime) 
| where TimeGenerated < startofday(dateDatetime) + 1d
| project TimeGenerated, ["Data Source"] = original_host, ["Message Details"] = Description, ["Job Type"] = JobTypeDescription, State = JobResultMessage, SyslogMessage
content.title: Finished Restore Sessions by Type Drilldown

items.name: Finished Restore Sessions by Type Drilldown

content.query:
let session_states_lookup = _GetWatchlist("session_states_lookup"); 
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| project TimeGenerated, Description, event_module, instanceId, original_host, Platform, Severity, Version, JobSessionID, JobID, JobResult, JobType, JobTypeDescription, Allowance, SyslogMessage
| where instanceId in ("150", "450")
| where JobResult in ("2", "3")
| lookup kind=inner (session_states_lookup)
    on $left.JobResult == $right.JobResult
| extend VmName = extract("VmName=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| summarize Total = count() by VmName, JobResultMessage
| project VmName, Status = JobResultMessage, Total
| order by 'Failed' asc
| take 15
| render barchart
content.title: Unsuccessful VM Backups

content.query:
let session_states_lookup = _GetWatchlist("session_states_lookup"); 
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| project TimeGenerated, Description, event_module, instanceId, original_host, Platform, Severity, Version, JobSessionID, JobID, JobResult, JobType, JobTypeDescription, Allowance, SyslogMessage
| where instanceId in ("151", "451")
| where JobResult in ("2", "3")
| lookup kind=inner (session_states_lookup)
    on $left.JobResult == $right.JobResult
| summarize Total = count() by JobTypeDescription, JobResultMessage
| project JobTypeDescription, JobResultMessage, Total
| evaluate pivot(JobResultMessage, sum(Total))
| order by 'Failed' desc
| take 15
| render barchart
content.title: Unsuccessful Unstructured Data Backups

content.query:
let session_states_lookup = _GetWatchlist("session_states_lookup"); 
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| project TimeGenerated, Description, event_module, instanceId, original_host, Platform, Severity, Version, JobSessionID, JobID, JobResult, JobType, JobTypeDescription, Allowance, SyslogMessage
| where instanceId in ("151", "451")
| where JobResult in ("2", "3")
| lookup kind=inner (session_states_lookup)
    on $left.JobResult == $right.JobResult
| extend VmName = extract("VmName=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| where JobTypeDescription == "{UnsuccessfulUnstructuredDataBackupsName}"
| project TimeGenerated, ["Data Source"] = original_host, ["Message Details"] = Description, ["Job Type"] = JobTypeDescription, State = JobResultMessage, SyslogMessage
content.title: Unsuccessful Unstructured Data Backups Drilldown

content.query:
let session_states_lookup = _GetWatchlist("session_states_lookup"); 
Veeam_GetJobFinished
| project TimeGenerated, Description, event_module, instanceId, original_host, Platform, Severity, Version, JobSessionID, JobID, JobResult, JobType, JobTypeDescription, Allowance, SyslogMessage
| where instanceId in ("150", "450")
| where JobResult in ("2", "3")
| lookup kind=inner (session_states_lookup)
    on $left.JobResult == $right.JobResult
| extend VmName = extract("VmName=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| where VmName == "{UnsuccessfulVMBackupsName}"
| project TimeGenerated, ["Data Source"] = original_host, ["Message Details"] = Description, ["Job Type"] = JobTypeDescription, State = JobResultMessage, SyslogMessage
content.title: Unsuccessful VM Backups Drilldown
